## function_createRating
> **createRating**(`config`?): [`RatingWidget`](#ratingwidget)

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:253](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L253)

Create a RatingWidget with given config props

### Parameters

#### config?

[`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`RatingProps`](#ratingprops)\>

an optional alert config

### Returns

[`RatingWidget`](#ratingwidget)

a RatingWidget

## function_getRatingDefaultConfig
> **getRatingDefaultConfig**(): [`RatingProps`](#ratingprops)

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:227](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L227)

Returns a shallow copy of the default rating config.

### Returns

[`RatingProps`](#ratingprops)

a copy of the default config

## interface_RatingApi
Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:181](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L181)

Interface representing the API that can be performed on a rating component.

### Methods

#### leave

> **leave**(): `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:199](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L199)

Leave the rating, resetting the visible rating to the rating value and triggering the onLeave callback

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### setHoveredRating

> **setHoveredRating**(`index`): `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:194](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L194)

Sets the hovered rating value.

##### Parameters

###### index

`number`

Star index, starting from 1

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### setRating

> **setRating**(`index`): `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:187](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L187)

Sets the rating value.

##### Parameters

###### index

`number`

Star index, starting from 1

##### Returns

`void`

## interface_RatingDirectives
Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:143](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L143)

Interface representing directives for a rating component.

### Properties

#### containerDirective

> **containerDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:148](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L148)

A directive to be applied to the main container
This will handle the keydown, mouseleave, tabindex and aria attributes

***

#### starDirective

> **starDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)\<\{ `index`: `number`; \}\>

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:153](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L153)

A directive to be applied on each star element

## interface_RatingProps
Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:90](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L90)

Interface representing the properties for the Rating widget.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:77](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L77)

The aria label

##### Default Value

`'Rating'`

***

#### ariaLabelledBy

> **ariaLabelledBy**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:84](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L84)

The aria labelled by

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### ariaValueTextFn

> **ariaValueTextFn**: (`rating`, `maxRating`) => `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:101](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L101)

Return the value for the 'aria-valuetext' attribute.

##### Parameters

###### rating

`number`

Current rating value.

###### maxRating

`number`

maxRating value.

##### Returns

`string`

##### Default Value

```ts
(rating: number, maxRating: number) => `${rating} out of ${maxRating}`
```

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/commonProps.ts:10](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/commonProps.ts#L10)

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### disabled

> **disabled**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:46](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L46)

If `true`, the rating is disabled.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### maxRating

> **maxRating**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:39](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L39)

The maximum rating that can be given.

##### Default Value

`10`

***

#### onHover

> **onHover**: (`rating`) => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:125](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L125)

An event emitted when the user is hovering over a given rating.

Event payload is equal to the rating being hovered over.

##### Parameters

###### rating

`number`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onLeave

> **onLeave**: (`rating`) => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:137](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L137)

An event emitted when the user stops hovering over a given rating.

Event payload is equal to the rating of the last item being hovered over.

##### Parameters

###### rating

`number`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onRatingChange

> **onRatingChange**: (`rating`) => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:113](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L113)

An event emitted when the rating is changed.

Event payload is equal to the newly selected rating.

##### Parameters

###### rating

`number`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### rating

> **rating**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:32](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L32)

The current rating. Could be a decimal value like `3.75`.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### readonly

> **readonly**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:53](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L53)

If `true`, the rating can't be changed.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### resettable

> **resettable**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:62](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L62)

Define if the rating can be reset.

If set to true, the user can 'unset' the rating value by cliking on the current rating value.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### tabindex

> **tabindex**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:70](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L70)

Allows setting a custom rating tabindex.
If the component is disabled, `tabindex` will still be set to `-1`.

##### Default Value

`0`

## interface_RatingState

***

#### disabled

If `true`, the rating is disabled.

***

#### interactive

> **interactive**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:171](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L171)

is the rating interactive i.e. listening to hover, click and keyboard events

***

#### maxRating

> **maxRating**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:39](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L39)

The maximum rating that can be given.

***

#### rating

> **rating**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:32](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L32)

The current rating. Could be a decimal value like `3.75`.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### readonly

> **readonly**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:53](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L53)

If `true`, the rating can't be changed.

***

#### resettable

> **resettable**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:62](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L62)

Define if the rating can be reset.

If set to true, the user can 'unset' the rating value by cliking on the current rating value.

***

#### stars

> **stars**: [`StarContext`](#starcontext)[]

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:175](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L175)

***

#### tabindex

> **tabindex**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:70](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L70)

***

#### visibleRating

> **visibleRating**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:167](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L167)

the visible value of the rating (it changes when hovering over the rating even though the real value did not change)

## type alias_RatingWidget
> **RatingWidget**: [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`RatingProps`](#ratingprops), [`RatingState`](#ratingstate), [`RatingApi`](#ratingapi), [`RatingDirectives`](#ratingdirectives)\>

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:205](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L205)

## interface_StarContext
Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:15](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L15)

Represents the context for a star in a rating component.

### Properties

#### fill

> **fill**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:19](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L19)

indicates how much the current star is filled, from 0 to 100

***

#### index

> **index**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/rating/rating.ts:23](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/components/rating/rating.ts#L23)

the position of the star in the rating
